comment.author: 76204898@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/29079609@N02] Wrong link. Namur is in Wallonia, Diest is in Flemish Brabant. Diest is a city and municipality located in the Belgian province of Flemish Brabant. Situated in the northeast of the Hageland region, Diest neighbours the provinces of Antwerp to its North, and Limburg to the East and is situated around 60km from Brussels. From the Dutch Wikipedia: "Tussen 1837 en 1853 werd Diest voorzien van nieuwe wallen en versterkingen, gericht tegen een mogelijke Hollandse inval. Deze fortificaties waren al verouderd bij het uitbreken van de Eerste Wereldoorlog." Roughly: Between 1837 and 1853, Diest was equipped with new walls and fortifications to protect against a possible Dutch invasion. These fortifications were already outdated by the beginning of the First World War.
